title: AI Chat Interface
summary: Real-time chat with streaming AI responses and message persistence.
description: A full-featured chat application built with Next.js and the AI SDK. Features real-time messaging, streaming responses, dark mode support, and a clean, minimal UI.

title: Design System Component Library
summary: Reusable UI component library with comprehensive documentation.
description: A custom component library featuring buttons, cards, inputs, and more. Built with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Storybook for interactive documentation.

title: Task Management App
summary: Collaborative task manager with real-time updates and team features.
description: A powerful task management application with real-time collaboration, custom workflows, and detailed analytics. Built for teams who want to get things done.
